name: Queen room in a charming villa
neighborhood_overview:
This a nice multicultural, family neighborhood.
Easily accessed by public transportation, car or bicycle.
description:
The house is located in a friendly and safe neighborhood of Boston.
All utilities and WIFI are included. Shared bathroom/kitchen.
The bus line is less than a minute walk away.
The house is just around the corner from the "Pleasant Caf√©" restaurant, Roslindale, MA.

The space
The room is private and has two windows overlooking the yard. It is on the second floor of the house.

Guest access
Guest has access to everything in the house, Kitchen, bathrooms, living room, dining room, washer and drier.

Other things to note
I speak French, Arabic and some Spanish.
